content.detailedDescription: Large blue round light decending to the groung on southern sky within south sacramento county.  standing on back porch looking at sky after four nights of seeing large white light hovering and slowly moving 2 - 3 degrees left and right then going streight up; when we observed one large blue round 'light' decend to the ground from the sky.  the area of decent would place the object or light in southern sacrament county between mack road and possibly galt.  very large light/object not moving like a meteor as the decent was much slower and no 'trail' coming from the rear.  we noticed the 'light' because it seemed to come out of nowhere on a quiet night with no other activiy observed.  our reaction was one of shock due to the suddeness of it's appearance.  there was no sound associated with the object/light.  we lost sight of the object once it passed into the line of trees at ground level.
content.summary: Large blue round light decending to the groung on southern sky within south sacramento county.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking south on a side road that ran parallel to rt. 1 about 5 miles north of the northeastern edge of philadelphia near the neshaminy mall in the early evening sometime mid to late september of 1974.  as i walked i noticed an unusually bright light on the southern horizon. i stopped to observe the unusual light. it appeared to vary in brightness, as if to pulse at regular but slow intervals. i continued to watch the object for several minutes and noted that the general brightness of the pulse was increasing over time.  a short later i realized that the object was not pulsing at all but actually moving north and then receding southward in a regular linear pattern all the while nudging its overall positon northward slowly and inextricably approaching my vantage point. it seemed to follow the course of rt. 1 north in the direction of trenton, nj.  at this time i noticed two other bright lights moving in and out of my peripheral field of vision positioned one on the east side of the original light and the other on the west side of the object.  these objects moved quite differently than the first.  they also were moving northward slowly following the line established by the center object but rather than moving alternately southward and northward in the fashion of the central object, they zig-zaged back and forth from west to east and alternately east to west in a pattern mirroring one another on either side of the central object but never overlapping it as if the pattern of the center object formed a demarcation or boundry that neither ancillary object crossed.  all three objects were nudging slowly northward following their perscribed patterns of movement. my impression was that they were either looking for something or surveying the area. there was nothing at all random about their movement and they were absolutely coordinated in a way that implied a centralized plan or control.  

this continued for some time. i estimate roughly ten to fifteen minutes. eventually their position against the southern horizon lowered to the point that the surrounding trees impeded my view and they disappeared ... or so i thought. i stood awed for several minutes really sad that the incident was over thinking that i wanted to get a further view of the ballet i had witnessed and actually praying that they would come back.  

after several more minutes my wishes suddenly were granted when i heard a high pitched but low volume whirring sound like a jet enigine with a huge muffler on steroids. i could not get a fix on the direction from which the sound was coming until i looked up and realized that an object was literally several hundred feet in the air and almost directly overhead. i could no longer see bright light or light at all for that matter ... only the dark underside could be seen silhoueted against the surrounding night sky.  i could not make out any of the surface details of the underside of the object. it was simply a blacker circle against a nearly black backgroud. at the same time i looked east and noticed that one of the other objects was hovering over a small copse of trees maybe two or three blocks east but making no sound at all that i could make out.  this object's outline was similar in shape to the outline of a football and my guess was that it was disc shaped although it was difficult to tell due to the darkness.  it had a row of lights that outlined the shape. they were multi-tinted with different shades of color more like tints than hard colors. i never saw what would have been the third object after that time. i believe it would have had to have been the object west of the central one.  it simply was not there anymore and i had no idea where it had moved off to.

the object making the whirring sound situated over my head was quite large and i believe it was the one positioned in the center that was moving in the linear north/south direction although it is impossible to say for sure since i had lost sight of all of the objects for several minutes when they fell below my line of sight. i estimate it to have been 100+ feet in diameter. it was dark and moving very slowly overhead at maybe 5 mph.  it was extremely disconcerting knowing that nothing that large i had ever seen could possibly remain in the sky even under power.  the object to my east over the tress did not move at all.  my impression was that they were aware they were being observed and were in fact observing me.  at that point i was fairly alarmed and wondering why the air force wasn't chasing these guys.

after minute or two both objects began moving off in a northeastery direction and though i gave chase on foot i lost sight of them very quickly.

several impressions come to mind.  first was that they were there for a reason to perform a specific task.  second ... every motion was coordinated and the objects were communicating with one another. i was both exhilerated and frightenend at the same time. as crazy as it sounds, at times i felt that they actually knew what i was thinking and that at least in the final stages of the encounter i was being observed which made me very, very uneasy. in the end, after a couple minutes of watching me watch them i proved uninteresting to them and they went about their other business. i was astonished that no one else seemed to have had this experience or reported the lights ... but to be truthful i am not sure if others reported sightings to authorities or not.  it was about this time that police officers reported a ufo landing in the newtown industrial commons maybe 7 miles north of where i was.  i think the two are related. i refrained from reporting what i had seen because it seemed so unreal to me at the time, even though i knew i had experinced the event.  i was convinced that it was possible to have been a kind of hallucinagenic stress related fantasy because i was under a lot of stress at that time in my life ... but it appeared quite real when it happened.  i think it did happen so after all these years i want to get it on record.

i have no means to do a computer aided map of the event and movements but i could draw it and send it snail mail if you requested it.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 101-500 Feet, Over 1 Mile
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Encountered 3 discs moving in a coordinated fashion in a northly direction

content.detailedDescription: I was a junior in high school at the time; i am now 23. my mother was driving me to a doctors appointment in the next town over. ( i had a sinus infection. ) my appointment was at 8:30pm. being that it was wintertime, it was already pretty dark. we left our house at 8:03pm and drove west down the road we lived on, onto a road called lehigh. on the left hand side of lehigh rd. was an un-farmed field with a small woods bordering it to the west and south west, if i have my directions straight. ( the woods are probably about 150 yards from the road. )  there are a few homes on the right side of the road. we were riding in a ford van ( like a church bus ) with windows all around. i was in the second row of back seats. i looked over toward the woods and saw a bright object over the tree- tops. it was bright yellow- almost white and although i couldn't see anything but the glow, it looked very solid. what i mean is, it was not like a reflection in the window but something really there. it was like a little disc- shaped sun. it moved back and forth over the treetops horizontally. the movement was fast but very smooth. it moved as though it could stop on a dime and instantly be moving in the opposing direction. this whole time we were still traveling down the road at about 30mph. surprisingly my mother did not appear to see it. and as we moved past it and out of view i dazedly said " hey, stop. " my mother kept driving to the next stop sign about 20 yards down the road. then she stopped and asked me what the matter was. i told her to go back because i saw something and she asked me what i saw. i told her to never mind, lets just go. though it was a surprise to see the object, for some reason i felt like the whole thing was nothing exciting. by the time i had gotten home from my appointment i had forgotten all about it. i remembered it later that night but it wasn't a big deal and i didn't talk about it to anyone. sometimes i wonder if my mother did see it but had the same odd "move along, nothing to see here" reaction that i did. it was a few years before i really took any interest in my personal experiences. this was triggered by seeing other objects in the sky and having a long rash of unsettling dreams.
content.summary: From the road i saw a fiery disc moving just above the treeline surrounding a field.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking a walk along with my dog at around 9pm last night. it was just getting dark, and the weather was clear. there are no trees or buildings near our farmhouse, and i could clearly see into the distant flinders ranges mountains.
suddenly, my dog started to bark, and i could see some flickering lights in the distance. first i thought it was an aircraft or a chopper, but then i realized the size of the object. it was huge. there were yellow lights on the three edges of the object, thats when i realized that it was something black and triangular. it was really big..I mean i could see it hovering near the base of the mountains some 10 kms away and the size was just enormous..I estimate it to be easily 100 feet plus. it was about the size of a 747, and it was hovering!! i could not believe my eyes. it stood motionless for about 5 minutes, then suddenly just lifted up and shot into the sky in a vertical motion. i couldnt believe it. i stood there for sometime trying to think what the hell just happened. i still cannot believe it. there must be some rational explination..But i'm hard pressed to find any. i have been living here for 20 years and have never once seen anything like it.
i dont know what it was but it sure as hell was not any conventional aircraft/helicopter.
hope someone can come up with a resonable explination.
cheers
content.summary: Triangle like object, hovered in the distance for about 5 min then sped off at high speeds

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out the dining room window at about 7:45 pm, waiting for my wife to come home from work, and was casually scanning the night sky as i usually do, watching the aircraft coming to and from from o'hare and midway. i noticed two reddish-orange pulsating lights coming over the horizon, beyond the trees, from the northeast, that immediately struck me as unusual because they were a reddish-orange, rather than white as commercial aircraft lights usually are, but i thought perhaps they were just different colored wing tip lights, and that maybe they looked colored because of the flight path towards me. when i first noticed them, they appeared to be about a handspan apart, then, as i watched with increasing amazement, they came closer together. my next thought was i was that i was watching private aircraft that for some reason were coming dangerously close. at that point, my wife came down the street to our house, and i ran out onto to the front porch (temperature outside was about 23 degrees)and frantically waved at my wife to get out of the car (she had pulled part way into the driveway), gesticulating wildly to get to her to look up to the northeast. she joined me on the porch, as 4 more pulsating lights appeared over the horizon, again ranging from a yellowish red to a reddish orange, with three of the lights spaced equidistantly on a diagonal, with the fourth, brighter "larger" light at the bottom of the diagonal and an arms' length from the three.  as my wife and i watched, the three lights on the diagonal moved closer together, and then the "top" light began to dim, finally disappearing altogether. the other two lights dimmed, and then disappeared. however, the fourth light kept coming towards us, getting somewhat brighter. i ran back into the house and got our binoculars. my wife and i both observed the light through the binoculars, and it appeared to be a solid, glowing, reddish-orange orb. no aircraft light triangulation, no blinking lights. it moved somewhat slowly and deliberately until it appeared to  be nearly over our house, and then disappeared, in that the light dwindled in apparent size and intensity and then appeared to blink out. the skies were partly cloudy, but clear over our house, with a crescent moon to the southwest, behind us and not visible in the section of sky we were looking at. the lights all seemed to move at approximately the same speed, which made me think initially i was watching aircraft flying in formation, and strangely occupying the same airspace at the same time. my wife, who is a veteran air traveler, agreed with me that what we saw were not commercial or privaate aircraft. and we both have seen meteors (perseids) at night,which have a downward trajectory, and these lights moved too slowly and deliberately on an apparent upward trajectory, to have been a series of meteors streaking across the sky. we're hoping to hear something on the news or in the paper, and hoping to hear that others in naperville saw the same thing. i was very excited after seeing these aerial phenomena - it reminded me very much of the scene in close encounters of the third kind when the people gather on the hillside and watch the "lights" moving gracefully in the valley below.
content.summary: Series of bright single-point colored lights flying in formation from the northeast

content.detailedDescription: My name is adrian rehn.  i was born in my eskimo villiage in mendecino, california.  at my bith, one of the elders predicted that i would have contact with a being unknown to the world.  he was very old, though, and many disregarded his remarks.  but we should have known better.  just this afternoon, i made the short walk from ashland high school to my house.  just a few minutes after getting home there was knock on the door.  i opened it and it was one of my friends alex nagel.  i was surprised to see him, as he usually doesn't come over.  he told me that i was to come with him somewhere.  i asked him where.  all of a sudden, my body began to vibrate and then all of a sudden i blacked out.  the next thing i knew, i was seated in a white room.  alex was there and so was another of my friends, wes overland.  i asked the what on earth was going on.  alex said that we're not on earrth.  all of a sudden, the dome of the room opened and revealed that we were drifting in space.  i could clearly see planet earth from my position.  they said that they had chosen me to be the bearer of tidings to our race, that there is another people similar to ours that have come to help us.  they said that they have been on our planet for around 10 years or so.  they are one of the few survivors of a planet thats history started around three million years before ours.  they created ships that could sustain them for many years, but also created a super weapon that detonated before most of the planets inhabitants could escape.  they are very similar to us, though they have been unable to reproduce on our planet, due to bad environmental conditions.  they also have a life span around five times longer than ours, though many of them have died as their immune system was unready for some of our diseases.  they ask that we help them find a way to seproduce in return for helping aide our politicians from making the same mistakes that cost them their planet.  i once again blacked and then found myself in my room when i regained conciousness.  i pray that we can help these peaceful people so that may help us.
content.summary: Close encounter of the 4th kind

content.detailedDescription: Our plane left the ottawa river @ rolfton heading nnw to our rendevous,a campsite on the dumoine river.Ahead, we (pilot                   and myself)spotted a brilliant blue/white glow coming from the forested hills ahead,we altered course to investigate as this was an unpopulated area without road access,when we approached we saw a large glowing object approx.150 ft x80ft. oval in shape casting a glow similar to that of an arc welder,it was hovering above the southern tip of an unfamiliar lake,the area below this object was completely devoid of water,you could see the mud and rotten tree stumps stretching beyond the objects sides at least 20 or 30 ft.And the water in the remainder of the lake was held back as if a glass barrier had been installed from shore to shore a distance of approx.300 ft. the object sported a number of pink lights midway down its sides from our view directly above.It did not appear to notice our plane and we did a right bank,circled once and proceeded on our way as we were short of time,it was nearing dusk and we were not equipped with landing lights nor radio (vintage 1946 j3 cub) pat made me promise not to disclose what we saw to anyone,he feared his pilots license would be jeopardized.Pat worked for                ,he was a good friend he passed away  a short while ago and i feel i no longer must keep this promise.I might add that upon our return to deep river one week later his wife  greeting us,said we had missed all the action,that ufo,s had been buzzing the aecl plant in chalk river all week,i have never seen anything that would attest to this but it should not be too much of a problem for you to find this out ,it would then give an exact date for our encounter
content.summary: Object sited below our aircraft (1400-1600 ft.) in north woods. this is the 1 st of two confermed sightings.

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home from my daughters house on the back country roads which are county road 450 n and 300 west when i stopped at the stop sign i saw a bright white beam of light over the trees to the north east of me along county road 425 north. i rolled down my window when i watch the object quickly shut off the beam of light and slowly come across the road and across the field in front of me.  it hovered directly in front of my car for a few seconds at which time i became very scared to think it was so close to my only grandson's house and i do believe if it turned the light on i would be a pile of dust in the road or severly burned.  it suddenly banked and turned to the southwest and crossed over county road 500 or gem rd and i followed it.  it appeared dark and rectangular crossing the field but when it got over 500 & 300 i could see it had a misty cloud around it and it was a gun metal gray color and was a circular object with three old automobile round lights on the side that were white and blinked on & off very slowly.  i have later seen the three lights in the same area and a rount orange-red ball of light in the same wooded area where i first spotted the object.  i am a 60 years old and i am not on drugs or do not drink or even smoke. i have never seen anthing like this object.  it did not make any sound and was about 25-30 feet wide and could travel as if it was gliding thur the atmosphere.  i called the local authorities, cia, fbi and the faa and reported this and no one was of any help in finding out what this object was and why it is in our country.  i do not believe it is one of our military projects.  i received burns to my eyes and my nails on my left hand broke and cracked and i felt weird for about a week. i have found out that another elderly couple saw an object at county rd 200 west in the same area in april 2006. i have been told that a young lady that 
lives in the same area has seen three orange colored lights at different times that remain stationary and fade in and out of sight.  i intend to look for signs & keep a watch on this area and get pictures or videos of these objects.  i do not like anything that may pose a threat to my family or to my country.  i am amazed at how many people are brain washed in thinking that nothing like ufos could exist.
content.summary: Observed  ufo object &  misterious lights in same area in hancock county in

content.detailedDescription: On december 10 at approximately 7pm at my home north of st. augustine, after taking out the trash, i stopped to look at the stars in the clear night sky. i noticed an object directly overhead that looked like a comet.  i called my wife and we both looked at it for about 10 minutes.  the head of the comet pointed to the west and a cone shaped tail spread out toward the east from the head a short distance. the object did not appear to be moving, which made me think the object was a comet as they move very slowly in relation to the earth rotating. the object did not appear to be low in the atmosphere as commercial planes could be seen by their navigation lights, but none of them passed in front of the object. i tried to view it through binoculars but was unable to gain the focus needed to see the object well.  i went inside and surfed the internet for about 20 minutes trying to find the name of the comet, but i found nothing.  i returned outside look at the object again, but the object had disappeared. i can only surmise that what i saw was not a comet, but something else.
content.summary: Not a comet?

content.detailedDescription: As i was leaving my home,i walked towards my car and heard an airplane in the air.When i looked up i imediately saw 4 ojects following the plane, at first i thought they were gray balloons. as the plane began to make a turn headed north five more objects came into view. what puzzled me was that they were not in any formation. they just looked like balloons. all of a sudden the first 4 objects i saw, split into two pair and sped off and each pair went to oposite sides of the plane (wings) as though they were escorting it.The other 5 objects then came out of there jumbled mess and form a formation(v type) behind the plane. they moved very quickly.Very controlled with no noise. they appeared to glide into position all you could hear was the plane.In looking at what i was seeing all kinds of things were going off in my mind.I tried to discount it by thinging a big shot from washington was in town and he had a military escort.But i later found that no-one was in town. and would you really need nine escorts.I remember saying to myself when observing the objects.We must have some very fast small planes.Although i could make out the plane they were following by seeing the wings and body as well as the tail.There were no wings or tail section visable on the objects. just a  grey sphere.I watched the plane and the objects until they were out of view.The encounter lasted 3-4 minutes. this is so true........Someone needs to come clean on what this was. absolutely incredible!!!!!!!
content.summary: Nine objects  folling a large plane

content.detailedDescription:
This is the first time i've ever reported a ufo sighting, though after yesterday evening, i find it very necessary.

i left work in harrisburg, pa at 4:30 p.M. to do some quick christmas shopping at the outlets in hershey, pa.  as i headed down route 422 through the town of hershey, i noticed an object at about 45 degrees up in the sky to the north, over hersheypark from 422.  what i saw in the sky was very hard to describe.  at first i thought it was a large airplane reflecting sun periodically, but when the shining/relecting faded, nothing was visible whatsoever.  i kept noticing this light as i continued through town on 422 until i was waiting at the light to turn on to 743 when i got a real good look at it and it looked like 2 separate lights close together in the sky.  once again, the lights just faded out.  

i turned on to 743, and drove up to the outlets, turned into the outlet center, and quickly parked facing north.  i grabbed my binoculars, which are always with me in my jeep, and waited for the lights to again show themselves.  it took less than a minute for them to appear, but this time there were two separate groups.  one group to the left with just two lights, and another group due north with 5 lights.  it was interesting to watch the lights appear since they would each illuminate individually, then fade out individually like a spark from a campfire, but in the same order they originally lit up, and constantly remaining in the exact same position in the sky, appearing in a subtle upward arc.  i tried looking at them through my binoculars, but they immediately fogged up thanks to the cold evening air.  i felt so helpless and frustrated, standing there watching this, with no one else to witness it, and no camera or camcorder.  

the event lasted a total of about 20 minutes, between being in my vehicle, and watching from the parking lot.  they slowly wandered off to the east/north east, still appearing every couple minutes and then again fading out.  

if anyone has any other info on this sighting, please find a way to contact me via the administrators of this site who do in fact have my email and physical address.  i'd love to have an opportunity to talk with someone else about this.
content.summary: 2 separate groups of star-like lights that appeared, disappeared then reappeared repeatedly

content.detailedDescription: On december 12, 2007, i had just picked up my wife from her workplace. at approximately 5:10 p.M. est., as we were heading home we both saw a star like white light in the nnw sky. we normally don't think too much about lights of this nature because we live about 6 miles from a nearby airport, so lights from aircraft are commonplace in our area. just as we noticed this bright light, it separated into multiple lighted objects in a perfectly horizontal dispersion pattern. the original light was still there, however, now there were doubled-up lights, 3, on both the right and left side of the center light. the double lights on both sides then became elongated, and then totally disappeared from sight. this whole incident took place in a matter of about 10 seconds. i commented to my wife, "did you see that?", she replied "yes! i wonder what it was?" i thought at first that someone was shooting up fireworks, but that didn't seem likely since the lights dispersed horizontally, and didn't ark downward as fireworks normally do. i then thought that it might have been a meteor, but the sky was clear enough at the time so that there was no noticable, or discernable lighted trail behind the object. i shared these facts with my wife as we continued on home. when my wife and i got into the house, no more than 10 minutes later, i turned on the t.V. to see if there was anything on the local news channel about what had occurred. i was wondering to myself if an aircraft on approach to our local airport has exploded, and if so, would it be on our local news station. as it turned out, there was nothing on our local news station about the event either on the 6:00 p.M. or the 11:00 p.M. news. i called the national ufo reporting center to report what both my wife and i had seen, and i also filed a written report to their online center as well. i later received a phone call from peter davenport from the center, and he told me that the incident would be looked into. i also reported the incident in an email to our local news affiliate, but as of today 12/13/07, i have not received any reply.
content.summary: Star like white light separating into multiple lights perfectly horizontal from center.

content.detailedDescription:
I told my fiance' several times about this light that would move in strange patterns above the house while i was lounging in the pool! i was floating on mattress so at first i thought nothing of it! then it started moving in even stranger patterns! comming in closer! then going back up higher! movement was nothing! like a plane or helicopter! even considered it may be a stearman plane as we do have several local guys who fly these types! they said no! so my fiance started teasing! and it ticked me! because it would come in close when i was alone! and act weird! but not when i would call him to look at! had dogs in the yard and they would be watching it! and growling! acting weird too!I would get weird feelings of electricity when i was in the water! hair standing up!  so....That christmas we get a new video camera! and the following summer 2006! i got several different shots of it on tape! and i saw it several times through the winter months! but to cold to stand and video! i still have the tapes! i wouldn't tape over them!Soon after taping! the camera's battery started acting up!Thought i had screwed it up or something!  so i bought new battery! worked fine for a very short time! no problems! then orb came back later in the summer of 2006 taped it again! camera!~ battery would go low really fast and just shut off again!! i'd charge it again!It worked fine! when i used it to tape the dogs and granddaughter! then it came again! so i go get camera! and try to tape and again  the cam would just shut off! even when i new the battery was charged!So i went inside andthe camera would work fine! so then had some friends over!For a barbique and again there it was! so i asked them what they thought. we laughed and threw ideas around!Andthen  she said that they were coming back to abingdon from gilson, il. which is east of here! just outside knoxville!  and that when they were out side of town here just out side of tiny town call delong! that is about 4 miles from my back yard!Our house is located on the back side of abingdon, and they saw it moving strangly in the sky over abingdon! and she said she told dave that it looked like it was right over our house from where they were located in delong!!And dave said to her! i wonder if bailey can see it! and they laughed about it! but they thought that it was very strange! joking!!Not knowing that i had seen it a bunch of times! she also said that they had seen it several other times before that.When they were on the delong blacktop! so i know at least that i wasn't the only one that saw it!Don't know why it would hang around here! we are a tiny rural community! where nothing happens!But if you want to video it ! come on down! also! i still have 1 maybe 2 of the recordings that i made! it comes regular & i just stopped trying cause the camera goes dead!  i had so much photage!Didn't think i needed to keep all of them!If you would like i can send them to you! you can see what you think!Maybe you can tell me!I would explain it as a very large! shiney ballbearing!The way that it shined it looked like a silver glass  yarg globe! just like a huge ballbearing! my camera only zooms so far!And it would be very large in the camera! if it was as far up as a star! my camera couldn't zoom in on it! i am not crazy! and it comes around often! and it has been happening regular for 3 years! come on down! and check it out!Would love to know what it is!I don't have a cord that will allow me to send the video! i have an s-video cam!The tapes are very small! and i have not done anything to them! you can have them!Call me! if you like! i don't have to to fill all these things in!But the video! shows ir pretty well! 
sincerely,

bailey
content.summary: I had seen large orb several times in the area! while in our new pool at night!

content.detailedDescription: I      s
content.summary: Several different craft were clearly visiable. many other domestic aircraft appeared to be in persuit of these craft.

content.detailedDescription: Mom- on july 5,2007 at 1130 pm i was driving east on
content.summary: The witnesses reported seeing an object approach which they first thought was an airplane but turned out to be an object with two large front lights and colored underside lights

content.detailedDescription: A white streak of light shot across the sky so fast i couldn't catch it with the camera but i snapped a shot anyway and got this cigar shaped object moving south west in the same direction as the white streak around 10:15am wednesday morning 12/12/2007. picture taken from my yard.
content.summary: Cigar shaped object

content.detailedDescription:
It was approximately 6 pm when i was walking on the sidewalk of my home subdivision located in the city of santa rosa, in the province of laguna of the country, the philippines. the reason i was walking is to get to the nearby hobby shop to play trading cards and maybe some console games. 

the sky at that moment was pretty cloudy, although patches of cloudless sky can be seen, and sun, while setting, is partially visible. i first took notice of the object while i was trying to scan my current surroundings. 

when i first saw it, i thought it was a jet aircraft, since at first it has a jet stream, and the stream it left was really visible . what baffled me is that as it flew further, the jet stream it had produced has seemingly dissipated, although it still produces it, as if it was some kind of fragment. that baffled me because, of what i know of, jet streams produced by aircraft that produce them do not dissipate in a few moments, and, it didn't seem to resemble any conventional aircraft that we have . i also thought that it was a meteor, but it didn't seem to streak rapidly like one. i also thought it was a comet, since it characteristics are somewhat near to those of comets, but there were no announcements whatsoever that a comet was passing, so i also checked that one out. 

the object, seems to be round, and it gives a jet stream that dissipates rapidly, making it look like a comet or a meteor. its movement is not erratic, it only moves straight in one direction. it seems to move toward the magnetic north or northwest, although when i saw it, it was in the east because the sidewalk i was walking is facing west. although i cannot estimate how much, it was fairly high, but not high enough as it seems to pass through the clouds. 

i was fairly excited when i saw it, since i'm interested in ufos. i was able to take a picture of it with my cellphone, a nokia n70 with a 2 megapixel camera. it disappeared for a while due to cloud cover and the limited visibility at the sidewalk because it was near a wall. i tried chasing it by running towards the subdivision gates, as the sidewalk leads to the gates. after the sighting i showed the picture to my friends at the shop when i reached it.

i lost sight of the object when it reached some distance, and due to the limited visiblity of the location, even when i got out of the subdivision gates and into the main street, i just lost sight of it, and i think it disappeared into the clouds.

in my opinion, there is a high probability that the object i saw is identifiable, although up until now i still do not know what it is. thank you.
content.summary: A strange ball-like thing with dissipating jet stream

content.detailedDescription:
Driving through my home town of newmarket last night i happened to notice an object in the sky, roughly s/sw of my position.

i was less than 1/2 mile from my house and decided to continue home, but carried on glancing up at the object.

once home i got out from my car and observed it for a few minutes and took a picture with my camera phone.

it looked like a sphere on fire as it seemed to have flames coming from the top of it, although the whole thing looked like it was on fire. for a second i wondered if it might be the burner from a hot air balloon, but it was far too still, too small, not travelling in any noticeable direction and it was pitch black at this time of year.

after a few minutes (3-4) it just faded away.

i have never seen anything like this before and always been pretty sceptical of this type of event, however this was so unusual and has raised a few questions in my mind.
content.summary: Motionless ball buring in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
United press international

 nasa ordered to search for ufo data


published: dec. 10, 2007 at 3:40 pm
print story email to a friend font size:kecksburg, pa., dec. 10 (upi) -- the national aeronautics and space administration has been ordered to turn over records related to an alleged pennsylvania ufo sighting in 1965.

leslie kean, a freelance journalist with with financial backing from the scifi channel, filed a freedom of information act request for documents related to the dec. 9, 1965, incident in kecksburg, pa., the chicago tribune reported monday.

however, she filed a lawsuit in december 2003 when the space agency claimed not to have any documents related to the incident.

"in the beginning, they probably saw leslie's request and thought, 'oh, she's after ufos,'" said her attorney, lee helfrich of washington. "maybe they just didn't treat it seriously at first."

u.S. district judge emmet sullivan said in ordering nasa to perform a more thorough search of its records that its efforts comply with the information request thus far have been a "ball of yarn."

"i can sense the plaintiff's frustration because i'm frustrated," the judge said.
content.summary: At last the court orders nasa to come out with truth

content.detailedDescription: My self and my partner were at the spanish portugese border very high up we saw an aircraft doing a figure eight shape with its jet stream...It then broke off and did a heart shape....But also this was not a commercial craft ...And if military it did a sharpe right turn witwas h its jetstream...Then just disappeared was this a ufo?
content.summary: Figure eight

content.detailedDescription: we were on our way up to our lake place.  my son was driving and it was around 9:00pm driving down 169 north.  we were talking and then we noticed that there was a object that had bright white lights undernealth with some red lights and a red light on the top and some on the sides.  it was a little ways away down the highway.  then it started to decend on our side of the highway and shot straight across the highway stopped - like it was waiting for us to get closer. then flew over the car.  my son rolled down the car window and watched it go over.  it stopped and was sitting next to a tower that red lights.  it turned off the bright white lights and all you could see was the red ones.  it was like it was hidding and did not want anyone to see it.  we went further down the road watching in the rear window and it turned the white lights back on a left.
content.summary: Driving down 169 to lake cabin

content.detailedDescription:
At 6:45 pm, 7 of our family members witnessed a "star" in the sky that had a fan tail that looked like "vapor" that was not as bright. the star and fan was directly above and to the western sky.  it moved in the directon of the "point" of the fan (west) then changed more of a nnw direction.  as it moved, the star disappeared, but the lit vapor continued to glow, but the "fan shape" became more shapeless, just a glow.  the glowing area moved pretty quickly across the sky in about 2 minutes to the nnw location and remained still.  throughout the event, there were flashes of light emitting from the glowing area.  gradually the glowing area faded, but was still visible.    we had to leave, so we assume that the area continued to fade. we called our local news and we heard 2 others had also called.  see link to see explaination:

 http://www.Wspa.Com/midatlantic/spa/news.Apx.-content-articles-spa-2007-12-10-0015.Html
content.summary: Light high in sky, appeared at first with brigher star with a fan tail, then faded.

content.detailedDescription:
This evening i could have filmed an ovni in broad daylight having the form of a flying saucer or since(as,like) form of cigar or lentil that some they call him(her). it is possible to to see clearly as this object turns environment to his(its) axis(axle) but horizontally and a little scarcely it(he,she) can there turns that under this exists as a black object that turns for below, difficultly of seeing but it is possible to to see. the ovni aparecio to 90 degrees in the zenith, being i put to bed in the soil could see it to appear, and then it(he,she) takes course towards the west, which clearly in the video it is possible to to see. there comes a point in which i do zoom to him(her) and this ship i know escapes from me of the screen, then i do zoom backward and it is achieved to see the wall of my roof and already in the sky i know at all(nothing) one sees.
i devote myself turned sideward with the chamber(camera) that i know it one sees also in the video, but not this more ovni. i extinguish the filmadora, and to simple sight i manage to see it but already was not on the west since i know dirigio, but that was in south direction and already it(he,she) was more above(up). then desaparecio at one stroke. this ocurrio it be 5:57:28 pm.
content.summary: Cigar of metal.

content.detailedDescription:
1.Witnesses: debbie, brienn and chanel fusco ages 53-30 and 26 respectively
were standing outside smoking cigarettes at the rear of my mother in laws home in seaville,nj at around 11 pm on monday december 3rd, 2007.

a very large low flying craft (perhaps 80 feet long) containing many different colored lights and producing a very odd mechanical whooshing sound suddenly appeared from the left side of their field of vision and slowly hovered around the perimeter of the house in a straight line. 

they "all" felt as if they were being observed.
they all felt a sensation of fear when they realized the object was not an airplane.
they had no desire to observe where the object was heading after it left their field of vision. (they were all scared)

they reported no wings on the low flying craft that was below the tree line at the rear of the home.

they never heard or saw anything like it before.
content.summary: A large hovering craft with many lights and odd mechanical whooshing sound

content.detailedDescription: I was driving about 65mph to 70mph in vehicle going northbound on 169. i noticed a object go through the top corner of my windshield it had two box lights on each side with flashing red and amber lights the color of it was almost silverish. i didnt know what it was looked very strange and big.  it was flying northbound with  highway 169 on the right of the highway over the trees about 250 feet in the air going about 90mph going very slow the object then increased speed went about 5 miles up took a right angle turn over the highway followed the highway back towards us but on the other side of the highway going southbound with the highway stoped by a radio tower that is about 300 feet in the air and while this happened i was driving watching its every move. we then went by the radio tower i had my window rolled down to ensure what i was seeing it had its white lights off and it was hovering 50 feet away from the tower in the air about a 3/4 of mile i was still looking at it in my rear view mirror it hovered up above the tower 100 feet then took off straight up in the air. it was a very amazing sight, as this is my second encounter previous encounter was in 2000.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Saw a flying object go over the car going north on highway 169

content.detailedDescription: We were driving down highway 169 going north when a large object that was flying very low to the high way went over our car. it had two bright white lights that were almost like stobes, and a bunch of flashing red lights. after it flew over the car it remained flying very low along the tree line on the right side of the high way, it was going very fast, and then all of a sudden it shot straight across the road towards the west (left), and then came back south towards the car but on the opposite side of the highway. my boyfriend followed it with his eyes all the way next to the radio tower, about a 1/2 mile later we were passing the tower and all of a sudden the brilliant white lights shut off and all i could see was the red lights flashing about 150 feet to the right of the tower, about 250-275 feet up in the air, it looked as though the object was trying to hide its self. we kept driving past the tower and about 1/4 mile after we past the tower we saw its bright white lights turn back and at it flew straight up in the air and then was gone.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It flew over the top of the car, then went straight across the road, then just sat by a radio tower and turned off its white lights, as though trying to camoflaug its red lights with the tower.

content.detailedDescription: Newbridge co kildare. ufo seen at 230pm on sat 8th dcember 2007
content.summary: Mysterious lights in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
A friend was driving and we stopped at the intersection of the old cleveland high school (now a middle school) and hwy 321 which goes to dayton (about 25 miles away).  we saw a star. it got brighter and brighter until it was a triangular object over my friend's pickup.  i didn't think of ufo, or anything strange, i just said to my friend, "damn, if that was an airplaine it would blow us off the road" (it seemed that close overhead.)  later, i started reading articles in the houston enterprise of a family in dayton who got radiation poisoning when they had an incounter with a ufo.   unsolved mysteries did a bit on this (the tv show).  they blamed the air force and sued them.  according to unsolved mysteries, the air force tore up the road where the thing landed and hauled it away.  i have no first hand knowledge of that.  after reading the paper shortly after, i just remember thinking, "hey, that could have been us!"  i remember that the "star" first appeared in one direction, then appearred as a triangular object with different colored lights on each side, the quickly sped away, again appearing as a bright star in the direction of dayton. this was in about 1980, give or take a year.  

for some reason this part of texas is like a beakon to ufos i think, though i don't know what they are.  in the 1970s several times my grandmother while sitting on the front porch at night would tell me about "something which looked like the full moon that lit up the whole front porch", and my great-aunt who lived across the pasture would also confirm this.  neither of these women had probably even heard of ufos.
content.summary: Ufo event in which people in dayton later sued the air force
